main_definition: To have knowledge or awareness about something through experience, learning, or information.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be aware of facts or information.
meanings_and_examples.example: I know that Paris is the capital of France.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To recognize someone from past encounters.
meanings_and_examples.example: She knew her old friend when she saw him at the reunion.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To understand or perceive something intuitively without explicit knowledge.
meanings_and_examples.example: He seemed to know what was wrong even before it was explained to him.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In terms of relationships, to be intimately familiar with someone's feelings and life.
meanings_and_examples.example: They have known each other since childhood and understand each other very well.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To predict an outcome or event based on experience or intuition.
meanings_and_examples.example: I know it will rain tomorrow because the sky is getting darker.
